Articles.Content:
Ok, this is the first time I've come on a forum in some time so please bear with me...

Anyway, I recently added the TCA (Throttle Controlled Avionics) mod to my game and it seemed ok, but now it is acting up and not working..

Specifically, the TCA window (in pic http://imgur.com/a/9N0SE ) shows up while the game is loading and never actually goes away, the toolbar button doesn't do anything and I can't close the window even after the game starts or while I'm in the VAB.

Welcome to the mad house!

Do you have Module Manager? If you updated this mod, did you erase all its old files before?

You said it used to work? When? What did you do to your game since then?

Also summoning @allista.

Edited January 27, 2017 by Benoit Hage

Thanks, @Benoit Hage!

@astropithicus, this is definitely a problem with installation. Aside from ModuleManager TCA requires AT_Utils library which is bundled, but somehow some people lose it (haven't you, by chance, installed TCA through CKAN?).

Anyway, I would first recommend to reinstall from SpaceDock, which is the main TCA repository. Be sure to have ModuleManager and 000_AT_Utils in your GameData.

If that won't help, please, report back to TCA forum.

MM2.7.5

I'm pretty sure I deleted all the old files first, I'm playing KSP 1.2.2 x64 on HP laptop w/Windows10 (takes upwards of 45min to load...)

I have WAY too many mods installed I think.. 134 (more or less, but I NEED them LOL) something like 26000 patches get loaded...

The glitch? showed up a few days ago after I loaded a TCA update. (just had a thought, could 'toolbar-settings.dat' without toolbar installed cause a problem?) I have also been haphazardly trying to install a Logitech Wingman Extreme3D joystick, thought it might be fun to fly my ships with it.
I love Spacedock, always have the best mods. 000_AT_Utils is also installed, v1.4.0.0
